org.smartfrog.services.www
Class LivenessPageChecker

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.www.LivenessPageChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, LivenessPage
public class LivenessPageChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements LivenessPage

Model a liveness page. This is not quite a SmartFrog component, but rather a helper component for importing into other things, as needed. created 20-Apr-2004 16:11:51

getInputOrErrorText

protected java.lang.String getInputOrErrorText(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection)
this call assumes that the connection is open, we now go to get the text from the connection, be it good text or error text. If something goes wrong partway through a fetch, we return all that we had.

Parameters:
connection -
Returns:
null if there was no input from either stream, or something went wrong with the read.
